name: City Taxi Simulator 2018
description:
Fasten your seat belt and Pick up passengers as a taxi driver. Being a blocky taxi driver, you are in your craft taxi all day long. Therefore it's important you get to drive some luxury blocky car vehicles. Show off your driving skills in this precision parking and driving simulator. Pick blocky passengers up right on the roads and enjoy high speed driving while you taking them to their destination.
Do you like Blocky games ? City Taxi Simulator 2017 LA Rush Hour Cab Drive is one of the best Blocky games on the Appstore. Sit behind the wheels of a blocky cab – taxi car that is widespread in the City! Try to drive simple blocky cab at first and then upgrade it to a really luxury car! Earn money transporting blocky passenger to level your taxi car up.

KEY GAME FEATURES

- Great taxi simulator in cute blocky environments
- Avoid car accidents as every accident will result charging 250$.
- Transport blocky passengers to earn money and upgrade your taxi car
- Many different camera angles to achieve precision driving skills and steering control
- Huge variety of blocky traffic including trucks, buses and emergency vehicles
- Use mini-map to go easily to your desired destination.
